name: AFGTrainPlatformHologram
comment: Base Hologram class for constructing train platform buildings (Stations, Cargo, Empty etc.) as they all require a child RailroadTrack hologram

methods.name: FindOverlappingConnectionComponent
methods.comment: Check for platform connections to snap to

properties.name: mRequireSnapToPlatform
properties.comment: Overrides floor snapping and forces platforms to only snap to other platforms (not true for stations, true for other platforms)

properties.name: mPlatformConnectionComponents
properties.comment: The components of this hologram used for detecting platform snapping

properties.name: mConnectedPlatformComponents
properties.comment: Stores a reference to the other platforms this hologram is connecting to

properties.name: mSnapDistance
properties.comment: radius to allow snapping to occur

properties.name: mActorOverlapCheckRadius
properties.comment: radius to check for potential actors (platforms) containing connection components

properties.name: mStrictOverlapDistance
properties.comment: radius to allow component overlap checks to succeed after snapping

properties.name: mBreakSnapDistance
properties.comment: Distance from hitlocation to break snap, used to eliminate wibbily wobbily where holograms snap, and then alter their snap next frame the new location

properties.name: mIsOrientationReversed
properties.comment: Track whether this platform is flipped, is only assigned to snapped buildings

properties.name: mScrollTrackDirection
properties.comment: Track whether this object is scrolled (flipped) while snapped

properties.name: mPreviousScrollTrackDirection
properties.comment: Track changes to the scroll direction
